info.name: Diode API
info.description:
DiodeIO RESTful API for Toll Station Interoperability Data

## Base URL
Use ```https://localhost:9103/interoperability/api/```for all your requests.

## Date Formatting
Every endpoint that requires a date field must be populated with a date of the format ```YYYYMMDD```, otherwise the server will respond with an invalid date format error.

## JSON & CSV Functionality
Every available endpoint can respond with either JSON or CSV format. You have to specify your desired response type in the query parameter ```format={json|csv}```. By default the API will respond with JSON.

item.description:
The following endpoints have to do with the management of the logistical settlements between the operators.

Make sure you include your authentication token in the `X-OBSERVATORY-AUTH` header in order to execute the following endpoints.
